page.title: 01FARNWORTH
page.content: Farnworth is in the Bolton Metropolitan Borough of Greater Manchester. Farnworth has a reasonable sized new shopping centre and an open air market which is open on Monday's,Fridays and Saturday's. Early closing day for the small shops is Wednesday. Farnworth is not all shops there are factories and works as well as residential estates.Farnworth also has parks and plenty of open spaces for recreational use, it is on the fringe of the Coral-Irwell Valley Country Park. It also has quite a few restaurants and take away food shops. There is plenty of night life in Farnworth in the form of Night Clubs , Clubs, Theatre and pubs.
